statements: SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, total_clicks FROM marketing_strategies WHERE success_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, start_date, end_date, total_conversions FROM marketing_strategies WHERE total_clicks >= 100 ORDER BY total_conversions DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, success_rate, total_clicks FROM marketing_strategies WHERE total_clicks < 500 AND total_conversions > 50 ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies WHERE success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT strategy_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_strategies WHERE total_clicks > 100 AND total_conversions < 30;
SELECT * FROM marketing_strategies WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, success_rate FROM marketing_strategies WHERE total_clicks >= 50 ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT AVG(success_rate) AS avg_success_rate, MAX(total_clicks) AS max_clicks FROM marketing_strategies WHERE total_conversions > 10;
SELECT * FROM abtest_results WHERE user_id = 12345
SELECT campaign_id, impression_count, click_count FROM campaign_metrics WHERE total_cost > 1000
SELECT group_name, conversion_event FROM abtest_results WHERE conversion_rate >= 0.1
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_count FROM campaign_metrics WHERE click_count > 500
SELECT user_id, group_name, conversion_event FROM abtest_results WHERE campaign_id = 98765
SELECT * FROM abtest_results WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, conversion_event FROM abtest_results WHERE campaign_id = 1 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT group_name, conversion_rate FROM abtest_results WHERE conversion_event > 10 AND campaign_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, GROUP_CONCAT(group_name) AS groups FROM abtest_results GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impression_count) AS total_impressions FROM campaign_metrics GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_impressions > 1000 ORDER BY total_impressions DESC;
SELECT * FROM strategy_details;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT metric_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_metrics WHERE roi > 0.5;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, audience_age_group, target_region FROM strategy_details WHERE target_region='US';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE status='active';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, budget ASC, status
SELECT strategy_name, target_region FROM strategy_details WHERE audience_age_group='18-24' OR audience_age_group='25-34' ORDER BY target_region ASC

SELECT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM campaign_metrics GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_impressions > 10000
SELECT strategy_name, target_region, audience_interests FROM strategy_details WHERE target_region='Europe' AND audience_interests LIKE '%technology%'
SELECT campaign_id, end_date, roi FROM marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_metrics ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id=campaign_metrics.campaign_id WHERE clicks > 500 ORDER BY roi DESC
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiments;
SELECT user_name, country FROM users WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT result_id, conversion FROM results WHERE conversion = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM experiments;
SELECT experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, country FROM users WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM results WHERE conversion = TRUE;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketingCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_campaigns FROM MarketingCampaigns;
SELECT * FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE budget BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY end_date, budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%' ORDER BY budget ASC, start_date;
SELECT * FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE budget = (SELECT MAX(budget) FROM MarketingCampaigns);
